plot: Problems that seem huge to top-manager Konstantin and to young guy Yarik are so insignificant compared to a blind girl's problems. She just needs to cross the road.
title: Zebra
plot_es: Problems that seem huge to top-manager Konstantin and to young guy Yarik are so insignificant compared to a blind girl's problems. She just needs to cross the road.
